text: The Train Wreckers is a 1905 American silent drama movie directed by Edwin S. PorterThe Train WreckersTRAIN WRECKERS and stars Broncho Billy Anderson and Margaret Illington. ==Actors== * Broncho Billy Anderson as the last train wrecker * Margaret Illington as the switchman's daughter ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1905 movies Category:1900s drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies
title: The Train Wreckers
